name: Dr. Rajneesh Arora
message: Welcome to Shaheed Bhagat Singh State University. As Vice Chancellor, I am committed to fostering academic excellence, research innovation, and holistic development of our students. Our university stands as a beacon of quality education, preparing young minds to become responsible citizens and future leaders. We continuously strive to provide world-class infrastructure, experienced faculty, and a conducive learning environment. I invite all stakeholders to join us in our journey of educational excellence.

name: Dr. Harpreet Singh Gill
message: The Registrar office is dedicated to ensuring smooth academic and administrative operations of the university.

name: Dr. Sukhwinder Kaur
message: Academic Affairs office oversees curriculum development, examination processes, and maintains academic standards.

name: Dr. Amarjit Singh
message: Student Welfare office is dedicated to the overall well-being, counseling, and grievance redressal of students.

name: Dr. Manjit Kaur
message: R&D office promotes research culture, facilitates funding, and coordinates research activities across departments.

name: Mr. Gurpreet Singh
message: Finance office manages all financial matters including fee collection, expenditure, and financial planning.

name: Dr. Navdeep Kaur
message: Examination office conducts all university examinations with utmost fairness and transparency.

name: Mr. Balwinder Singh
message: Proctorial office maintains discipline and handles disciplinary matters on campus.
